title: Ephesus Historical Exploration
description:
Step Back in Time at Ephesus

Explore one of the most important archaeological sites in the world, Ephesus. This tour takes you through its ancient streets, grand theatres, and sacred sites that date back thousands of years.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Arrive and explore the ancient city of Ephesus. Walk through its famous streets, admire the Library of Celsus, and see the impressive Temple of Artemis.

Day 2: Visit the House of Virgin Mary and the Theatre of Ephesus. Learn about its rich history from expert guides.
shortDescription: Explore the ancient city of Ephesus
label: Popular

itinerary: See the House of Virgin Mary
remarks: Dress modestly when visiting religious sites

title: Mystical Konya Journey
description:
Discover the Spiritual Heart of Turkey

Experience the mystical city of Konya, the home of the whirling dervishes and Rumi's final resting place. This tour connects you with centuries of Sufi tradition and Turkish Islamic heritage.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Visit the Mevlana Museum and learn about the life of Rumi, one of the world's greatest poets and spiritual leaders.

Day 2: Attend an authentic Whirling Dervish ceremony and explore the ancient Seljuk architecture throughout the city.
shortDescription: Experience the mystical city of Konya
label: Cultural

remarks: Dress modestly when visiting religious sites
Photography may be restricted in certain areas

title: Istanbul: Bridge Between Continents
description:
Experience the Magic of Istanbul

Straddling two continents, Istanbul offers a unique blend of European and Asian cultures. Explore its magnificent mosques, bustling bazaars, and enjoy the vibrant atmosphere of this ancient city.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Visit the iconic Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque in the historic Sultanahmet district.

Day 2: Explore Topkapi Palace and enjoy a Bosphorus cruise witnessing the city from both European and Asian shores.

Day 3: Experience the Grand Bazaar and Spice Market, followed by a traditional Turkish hamam experience.
label: Best Seller

itinerary: Tour Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque
Explore Grand Bazaar and Spice Market

title: Gallipoli Battlefield Tour
description:
Honor the Fallen at Gallipoli

Take a poignant journey through the Gallipoli Peninsula, site of one of World War I's most significant campaigns. This tour offers profound insights into the ANZAC legend and the birth of modern Turkey.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Visit ANZAC Cove, Lone Pine Australian Memorial, and the 57th Regiment Turkish Memorial.

Day 2: Explore Chunuk Bair New Zealand Memorial, Turkish trenches, and the Kabatepe War Museum.
shortDescription: Journey through the historic Gallipoli battlefields
label: Educational

title: Eskisehir: City of Innovation
description:
Discover Turkey's Most Livable City

Known as the 'Venice of Turkey', Eskisehir combines traditional charm with modern innovation. Experience its beautiful canals, thriving university culture, and unique blend of Ottoman and European influences.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Explore Odunpazarı historical district with its colorful Ottoman houses and visit the Museum of Modern Glass Art.

Day 2: Enjoy a boat trip along the Porsuk River and visit Eskisehir's famous theme park, Sazova Science, Art and Culture Park.
shortDescription: Experience Eskisehir's unique blend of old and new
label: Hidden Gem

itinerary: Visit Museum of Modern Glass Art

title: Ultimate Turkey Adventure
description:
From Coast to Highlands: The Complete Turkish Experience

This comprehensive tour takes you through Turkey's most iconic destinations. Journey from Istanbul's bustling markets to Cappadocia's otherworldly landscapes and the turquoise coast of the Mediterranean.

Highlights of Your Journey

Days 1-2: Explore Istanbul's historic sites and vibrant culture.

Days 3-4: Discover the ancient treasures of Ephesus.

Days 5-6: Marvel at Pamukkale's white terraces and ancient Hierapolis.

Days 7-8: Experience the unique landscapes and balloon rides of Cappadocia.

Days 9-10: Relax at the beautiful beaches of Antalya.
shortDescription: Experience the best of Turkey in one journey
label: Premium

remarks: Optional hot air balloon ride available

title: Cappadocia Wonderland
description:
Explore Turkey's Fairy Tale Landscape

Journey through the magical region of Cappadocia, famous for its unique 'fairy chimney' rock formations, ancient cave dwellings, and spectacular hot air balloon rides at dawn.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Experience a breathtaking hot air balloon ride at sunrise over the unique lunar landscape.

Day 2: Explore the Göreme Open Air Museum with its ancient rock-cut churches and stunning Byzantine frescoes.

Day 3: Discover underground cities and hike through the Rose Valley, followed by a traditional pottery workshop in Avanos.
label: Most Popular

itinerary: Hot air balloon ride at sunrise
remarks: Early morning start for balloon ride
Weather may affect balloon ride schedule

title: Antalya: Turquoise Coast Paradise
description:
Sun, Sea and Ancient Wonders

Experience the perfect blend of relaxation and exploration on Turkey's stunning Mediterranean coast. Antalya offers pristine beaches, ancient ruins, and luxurious resorts all in one spectacular setting.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Explore Antalya's charming old town, Kaleiçi, with its Ottoman mansions and Roman harbor.

Day 2: Visit the ancient city of Perge and the spectacular Düden Waterfalls.

Day 3: Enjoy a boat trip along the coast with swimming opportunities in crystal-clear waters.

Day 4: Relax at one of Antalya's premium beaches and enjoy optional water sports activities.
shortDescription: Relax and explore on Turkey's Mediterranean coast
label: Luxury

title: Göbeklitepe: Cradle of Civilization
description:
Discover the World's Oldest Temple

Journey to southeastern Turkey to visit Göbeklitepe, a revolutionary archaeological discovery that has changed our understanding of human history. Dating back to 10,000 BCE, this site predates Stonehenge by 6,000 years.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Arrive in Şanlıurfa and visit the Archaeological Museum featuring artifacts from Göbeklitepe.

Day 2: Full day exploration of the Göbeklitepe archaeological site with expert archaeologist guides.

Day 3: Visit nearby Harran with its unique beehive houses and ancient university.
shortDescription: Explore the world's oldest known temple complex
label: Educational

title: Pamukkale & Hierapolis Discovery
description:
Natural Wonders and Ancient Splendors

Marvel at the stunning white terraces of Pamukkale ('Cotton Castle') and the adjacent ancient city of Hierapolis. This UNESCO World Heritage site combines natural beauty with fascinating history.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Explore the brilliant white travertine terraces of Pamukkale and bathe in the mineral-rich thermal waters.

Day 2: Discover the ancient city of Hierapolis with its well-preserved theatre, necropolis, and the sacred Cleopatra's Pool.
shortDescription: Explore the white terraces of Pamukkale
label: Natural Wonder

title: Troy: Myth and Reality
description:
Journey to the Legendary City

Step into the world of Homer's Iliad at the archaeological site of Troy. Discover the reality behind the legend of the Trojan War and the famous Trojan Horse in this UNESCO World Heritage site.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Explore the archaeological site of Troy with its nine different settlement layers spanning 3,500 years of history.

Day 2: Visit the Troy Museum housing artifacts from excavations and learn about the separation of myth from historical reality.
shortDescription: Discover the legendary city of Troy
label: Historical

remarks: Can be combined with Gallipoli tour

title: Ancient Treasures of Ephesus & Pamukkale
description:
Two UNESCO Wonders in One Journey

Combine the magnificent ancient city of Ephesus with the stunning natural terraces of Pamukkale on this comprehensive tour of Turkey's most impressive UNESCO World Heritage sites.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1-2: Explore ancient Ephesus with its well-preserved Library of Celsus, Grand Theatre, and Temple of Artemis.

Day 3-4: Marvel at Pamukkale's white calcium terraces and explore the ancient ruins of Hierapolis.
shortDescription: Experience two UNESCO sites in one journey
label: UNESCO Special

title: Turkish Delights Culinary Tour
description:
Taste the Flavors of Turkey

Embark on a gastronomic adventure through Istanbul's rich culinary landscape. From street food to fine dining, discover the diverse flavors that make Turkish cuisine one of the world's most celebrated.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Explore the Spice Bazaar and participate in a cooking class learning classic Turkish dishes.

Day 2: Food tour through different neighborhoods, sampling street food specialties and visiting local eateries.

Day 3: Experience fine dining Turkish cuisine and enjoy a Bosphorus dinner cruise with traditional entertainment.
shortDescription: Savor the authentic flavors of Turkish cuisine
label: Culinary

remarks: Dietary restrictions accommodated with advance notice

title: Cappadocia Photography Expedition
description:
Capture the Magic of Cappadocia

Designed specifically for photography enthusiasts, this tour takes you to the most photogenic locations in Cappadocia at the optimal times for lighting. Learn techniques from professional photographers while exploring this otherworldly landscape.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Sunrise hot air balloon ride for aerial photography, followed by a workshop on landscape photography.

Day 2: Dawn photoshoot at Pasabag (Monks Valley), followed by exploring cave churches and hidden valleys.

Day 3: Night photography session capturing star trails over the unique rock formations, with instruction on long exposure techniques.
shortDescription: Perfect your photography in stunning Cappadocia
label: Specialized

itinerary: Hot air balloon ride with photography focus

title: Black Sea Coastal Explorer
description:
Discover Turkey's Verdant North Coast

Experience the lush landscapes, unique culture, and hidden treasures of Turkey's Black Sea region. From misty mountains to ancient monasteries, this tour reveals a side of Turkey few tourists see.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1-2: Explore the alpine meadows and traditional villages of the Kaçkar Mountains.

Day 3-4: Visit Trabzon and the historic Sumela Monastery clinging to a steep cliff.

Day 5-6: Discover Amasya with its Ottoman houses and rock tombs of Pontic kings.
shortDescription: Experience Turkey's lush Black Sea coastline
label: Off the Beaten Path

remarks: Some remote locations with basic facilities

title: Turkish Hammam Wellness Retreat
description:
Rejuvenate in Traditional Turkish Style

Immerse yourself in the centuries-old tradition of the Turkish hammam. This wellness retreat combines authentic bathing rituals with modern spa treatments for complete relaxation and rejuvenation.

Highlights of Your Journey

Day 1: Experience a traditional hammam ceremony in a historic 16th-century bath house.

Day 2: Enjoy aromatherapy treatments and a private yoga session overlooking the Bosphorus.

Day 3: Learn about Turkish herbal remedies and tea traditions, followed by a luxury spa experience.
shortDescription: Relax with traditional Turkish bath experiences
label: Wellness

remarks: Inform of any health conditions in advance
